Articles.Content:
I'm going to be streaming live at 1230 PST check out the preshow!

I'm just going to be working out some kinks with my fuel line and hopefully be running some glide tests

http://www.twitch.tv/phenomanonx

See you there :-)

Thanks to those that came out. Sorry if I missed some of you, I was playing full screen and I never see who's on chat when that's the case.

The SSMET (Space Shuttle Main Engine Test) mission was a half success. The main thing being that my Orbital Test Vehicle flew, the engines work and everything is a go. I just didn't have enough oomph to land on the runway, but landing this vehicle is a sheer joy!

I'll be running another stream in a few minutes. (6pm PST, 9 Central)

This time I'll be recording the build of the main booster assembly. I've also had enough NASA.tv for the day, so music will be the backgound filler on this go around.

Once again, I'll be running full screen so leave a message in chat. I tried to reach a couple people via private message, but Twitch was acting up, so for those I missed, thank you very much!

Now off to go build a booster engine for the OV-1 - Wheeeeee!!!!

Cheers

Edited June 8, 2013 by Phenom Anon X
time update
